Html:
I've tried the new version of Triangle.Net and found it very good. Currently I am trying to write an pre-processor for an FEM model and Triangle.Net is very suitable for my studies. I am considering to embed it into an GIS-based GUI, and if you are intereted in this, I think I can do some contributions on it. Here are some more funcitons that the current veison of Triangle.Net may need:

(1) interpolation of scatter point values (e.g., water depth) to mesh nodes;

(2) mesh edit (e.g., delete mesh element, refine an elelment, thin element remove);

(3) mesh re-numbering and mesh smoothing.

Thanks for your good job!

Any contributions are welcome. Regarding point (3): I already got those working - but not very robust, so I decided not to put them in beta 2. Still I'd really like to see what you've done. Feel free to contact me via email (you should have received a codeplex mail notification about that).
